attributes.action: to increase the a19 to three lanes and ban slow moving vehicles
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To increase the a19 between middlesbrough and Newcastle (testos roundabout / felling bypass) to three lanes (either direction). Due to the ever increasing amounts of lane hoggers, cranes, JCBS and farm transportation that have made this road inherently dangerous and vein popping communte.
